summary: Tested Daily Digest backend endpoints and frontend data-testid presence. All 4 digest endpoints return 401 when unauthenticated. Digest scheduler confirmed running in logs. All required data-testids confirmed present in source code via grep. Regression tests for hub/personas (8), hub/agents (50), hub/personas/detect all pass.
critical_code_review_comments: No critical issues found. Digest scheduler uses in-memory state (user_email from db.digest_config) - if config is not set, digests silently skip.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Daily Digest feature fully implemented. Backend: 4 endpoints (/digest/config GET, /digest/config POST, /digest/trigger POST, /digest/history GET) all return 401 unauthed. Scheduler logs '[digest-scheduler] Started' on startup. Frontend data-testids present in code: digest-card, digest-toggle, digest-time-input, digest-save-btn, digest-trigger-btn, digest-status-badge, whatsapp-card. ChatPage: mic-btn at line 683, apply-persona-suggestion at line 653. SetupPage redirects to login when unauthenticated (cannot test rendered components without Google OAuth).
